title: FS/FT: C46 lot (6 remaining) good condition
author: darwinbulldog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: C46 lot (6 remaining) good condition
posts.post_content:
Price drop on 3/9/15.

$200 for all 6 cards.

Beebe (excellent w/ a faint wet sheet transfer on back) 
Brockett (good) 
Holmes (fair)
Dessau (fair)
Hughes (good)
Spencer (very good)

The other cards in the pictures have already been sold.
PM sent for a potential lift to my fledgling collection :)
Six C46s still available. PM if interested in singles or the full group.
Anyone interested in the rest of these fine C46s? Yours for $200 even.
